stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains "Subroutine End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag." for each revealed card of the chosen type.
text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains "[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag." for each revealed card of the chosen type.
title: Peeping Tom
